title: Large-Scale Reasoning Practice to Foster Mathematical Thinking: Mission Clear Project

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary arithmetic operations and simple problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Classroom enabling smartphone-based access to materials in PC-unavailable environments. Gamified learning environment combining teamwork and logical analysis

learning_goals: Learners can analyze given mathematical clues to determine the cause of an incident with 80% accuracy.
Learners can apply conflict management strategies three or more times through role division within a team.
Learners can visually represent problem-solving processes using a Root Cause Analysis (RCA) chart.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
